Och när den bannlyste riddaren Heraclio och hans armé hotar kungariket är det dags för Justin att bevisa vad han kan.

programme.title: Igor
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 2008. En ond vetenskapsmans puckelryggade assistent har ambitioner att själv bli uppfinnare. Men i en värld där alla föds in i sina roller, finns det flera som vill krossa hans dröm.

programme.title: Sammys äventyr 2
programme.desc: Belgisk animerad film från 2012. Sammy och Ray är barnvakter åt de mindre sköldpaddorna när de plötsligt blir fångade av dykare. De ska visas upp i ett akvarium.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: Amerikansk familjefilm från 1999. Familjen Little adopterar en söt liten pojke vid namn Stuart som ser ut precis som en liten mus. Deras andra son är inte säker på vad han ska tro och tycka och familjens katt lägger upp en plan för att bli av med Stuart för gott. Filmen visas dubbad.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 2013. När snigeln Turbo en dag mirakulöst blir supersnabb så ger han sig ut på en resa för att att få tävla mot världens bästa racerförare Guy Gagne. Turbo blir kompis med ett gäng gatusmarta lirare och sätter sitt hjärta och skal på spel för att bevisa att ingen dröm är för stor, och ingen drömmare för liten.

programme.title: Planet 51
programme.desc: Spansk-brittisk animerad familjefilm från 2009. När astronauten Chuck landar på en avlägsen planet fylld med små gröna varelser, förvånas han över att vi inte är ensamma i vår galax. Han blir överraskad när invånarna på planet 51 tror att hans närvaro är början på en invasion. Lyckligtvis inser snart en av invånarna på planeten att Chuck är ofarlig, och gör det till sin personliga uppgift att hjälpa honom att återvända till jorden.

programme.title: Kung fu panda 2
programme.desc: Amerikanskt animerat äventyr från 2011. Pandan Pos drömmar har gått i uppfyllelse  nu är han den legendariska drakkrigaren som beskyddar Fredens dal tillsammans med sina vänner. programme.title: Semi-pro
programme.desc: Amerikansk komedi från 2008. Jackie Moon är en före detta sångare vars liv kretsar kring det misslyckade basketlaget Tropics. Jackie både äger och spelar i Tropics men nu får han och hans lagkamrater reda på att ligan som de tillhör ska läggas ned. Enda chansen för dem att överleva som lag är att kvalificera sig till NBA.

programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud, he's given 30 days to get his affairs in order before doing time in San Quentin. Terrified of what prison life has in store for him, he hires his black friend to prep him for the experience.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: In high school, Bob Stone was a bullied geek and Calvin was popular. Years later, Bob returns as a lethal CIA agent that needs Calvin, who's now an accountant, to help solve a major case. The two enter a world of espionage that could get them killed.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After being bitten by a hybrid spider, Peter Parker soon discovers that his DNA has been altered and he's developed spider-like abilities.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After an NCIS agent is killed during security detail for the Vice Chief of Naval Operations, the team must determine if this was assassination or if someone is targeting one of their own. Meanwhile, Agent Brody is placed under investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Petty Officer is found murdered in the midst of Mardi Gras events, the team investigates what parades and parties led to his untimely death. Also, Pride must decide what aspects of his strained relationship with his father he is willing to share.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Navy recruiter is the target of a lethal hit and run, the team investigates whether the murder was tied to her career or her role as a foster mother to two brothers. Also, Lasalle grows increasingly concerned for his brother's welfare.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride is adamant the elusive 'Baitfish' has returned and, in an attempt to locate his nemesis, he has the team investigate crime scenes and chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, South Carolina.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS Special Agent Brody believes that a sailor hit by a party bus in the French Quarter is connected to her sister's death after the team discovers similarities between the two. Also, the team prepares for St. Patrick's Day festivities in New Orleans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team discovers a surveillance van filled with photos documenting Special Agent Pride's every move after his daughter is attacked on campus and placed in protective custody.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Navy lieutenant during a French Quarter second line funeral procession, a New Orleans tradition that celebrates the recently deceased with a musical parade.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a navy lieutenant dies during a clandestine visit to a general's hotel room, Special Agent Pride and the team are asked to break standard protocol for the murder investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A navy culinary specialist is the target of an explosion while visiting her family's 100-year-old restaurant in the French Quarter. Also, Brody is in D.C. tracking a lead in the General leak case.Guests: Gary Clark, John Besh, Susan Spicer, Leah Chase, Sue Zemanick..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team partners with Homeland Security after the murder of a Navy master diver is linked to chatter of a foreign attack on the city.

programme.desc: While conducting an autopsy on a petty officer who is believed to have died from natural causes, an armed man enters the morgue and holds Wade, Sebastian and Danny hostage.

programme.desc: Roz comes to terms with her impending motherhood and at Frasier's urging, decides to tell the news to the baby's father.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The station manager wants to throw a publicity rally to celebrate Frasier's 1000th show. This soon escalates into 'Frasier Crane Day,' leaving Niles very jealous. There is just one problem: Frasier can't seem to get there in time.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz gets an offer for a free cruise if Frasier agrees to make a celebrity appearance.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier has a relationship with a well-known attorney. All is well until his family point out that Frasier is playing out the role of the submissive female in the relationship.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After observing their constant bickering, Reba and Van's boss insist they see an occupational therapist. Meanwhile, Brock and Barbra Jean consult a sleep doctor.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: While Barbra Jean is away in St. Louis, Reba has to take care of an ailing Brock. Elsewhere, Cheyenne volunteers at a homeless shelter, but is disappointed when she is assigned the unglamorous task of doing dishes in the kitchen.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After Jake lies about breaking Reba's lamp, Reba is forced to retract her criticism of Barbra Jean's parenting skills. Meanwhile, Brock and Van are mistaken for a gay couple when they spend their 'guy time' at a day spa.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When the IRS audits Reba, she discovers that Brock has a few secrets he doesn't want the IRS to find out about. Meanwhile, Van receives a lot of attention from Cheyenne's classmates when he takes part in a sociology project about marriage.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy is contacted by a high school teacher she once had a crush on. They quickly begin seeing each other and Dorothy is convinced his feelings are genuine.Guests: James T. Callahan..

programme.sub-title: Journey to the Center of Attention
programme.desc: Blanche tries to cheer up a lonely Dorothy by taking her out to her favourite bar.Guests: Jane Dulo..

programme.desc: Dorothy gives a speech at Career Day and is offered a job as a motivational trainer.Guests: Tom Villard..

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall teaches the key shots to master to save strokes around the green. Learn how to hit crisp pitch shots like 2020 PGA Champion Collin Morikawa and improve bunker play from short game guru Dave Pelz.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall teaches the putting pointers used by the best players in the world. Martin reveals how improve on the green with a credit card and a coin. Learn a distance control tip from Ben Crenshaw and the direction drill Henrik Stenson has used.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O’Neal teach drills centered around getting more distance. Learn how Davis Love III trains to increase swing speed. Plus, Martin teaches a technique used by Olympic sprinters that translates into crushing it off the tee.

programme.title: School of Golf

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall explains how to become a better putter with a focus on aim, stability, arc and pace. Martin shares drills for each tool from some of the top putting gurus in the game including Dave Stockton, Phil Kenyon and the late Frank Thomas.

programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O’Neal will teach the cure for fatal flaws in your golf game. Learn drills to get into the proper position at the top with the driver, ways to improve your iron play without leaving the house and a tip to fix the short game.

programme.title: The Skill Code
programme.desc: Cameron McCormick brings you inside his lab to scientifically prove how ground forces affect the golf swing. McCormick explains how to achieve maximum power with the lead leg and how to move properly through the swing with the trail leg.

programme.title: The Skill Code
programme.desc: Cameron McCormick, 2015 PGA Teacher of the Year, provides a prescription and remedy to gain more distance off the tee and help those who suffer from a limited range of motion.

programme.title: The Skill Code
programme.desc: Cameron McCormick shares solutions to combat the most common contact and trajectory problems suffered by less accomplished players. McCormick identifies the fundamental reasons that players shank, thin and fat the golf ball.

programme.title: The Skill Code
programme.desc: Cameron McCormick teaches the what and how behind the score-saving shots that amaze us when we watch professional golf. Specialty shots take center stage as viewers will learn how to execute the ‘skid spinner,’ ‘super flop’ and the 'banker.'.
